explanation: [0-0] A right hand holds a crushed pink and white popsicle. A red arrow points to the left, and the background is a gray countertop. At the bottom of the screen are the words "@kingkhie" and "Kids, always check your Halloween candy".

[0-6] The camera then pans left to show a left hand holding a pink popsicle. A right hand enters the frame from the right, grabbing the popsicle. Simultaneously, a profile picture of a man with short hair appears in the lower left corner. He has a surprised expression, with his mouth wide open and head shaking. He begins to crush the popsicle, revealing the white interior. As he continues to crush it, a needle-like object and metal-like flakes appear inside. The man in the profile picture covers his mouth with his hand in shock. Two yellow emojis appear on the screen. The red arrow on the left disappears.
